title: Saturday, March 14, New Orleans Green Salon
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090611151529im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/new_5558.orleans_greensalon.jpg)
  
An all day event about sustainability and the communities of New Orleans.

[http://www.aiganeworleans.org/events/green-salon](http://web.archive.org/web/20090611151529/http:/www.aiganeworleans.org/events/green-salon "http://www.aiganeworleans.org/events/green-salon")

and download the complete schedule plus information about the many participants here...make sure to read all four pages of it.
